snippet.title: How to Recover Deleted Files from Compact Flash on Mac OS X
snippet.description:
How to Recover Deleted Files from Compact Flash on Mac OS X (http://www.datarescuetools.com/how-to/cf-recovery-mac.html)
1 point
by roseann
3 years ago
0 comment Follow
You have great chances to perform CF card data recovery on Mac OS X and on your own. As a matter of fact, a simple delete or format option wont be necessary to erase all data on the flash card. ONLY the index entry of the file system (usually FAT with a CF card) marks those files as deleted, how about the real data? YES, you guess it. It is STILL 100% intact there on the compact flash memory.
*[3 years ago]: 2011-08-04T10:31:10.000Z
